---
id: get-api-earn-top
title: "Get leaderboard"
description: "This endpoint retrieves the top 10 users based on their earnings today. It returns their username, coins, earnings today, avatar URL, and last seen timestamp."

---

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get leaderboard"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/earn/top/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves the top 10 users based on their earnings today. It returns their username, coins, earnings today, avatar URL, and last seen timestamp.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"statusCode":200,"message":"Leaderboard found","error":null,"leaderboard":[{"_id":"user_id","username":"example_user","coins":100,"earnedToday":50,"avatarUrl":"https://example.com/avatar.jpg","lastSeen":1698765432000}]}}}}}},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"serverError":{"value":{"statusCode":500,"message":"Internal server error","error":"An unexpected error occurred"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
